  physical_appearance: \The image shows a rectangular letter. There are two punch holes at the top of the paper.  \\On Admiralty List\\

 Appavoo

metadata.title_text: Testimonial letter about Mr Appavoo Kandiar by United Engineers Limited Testimonial letter given to Mr Appavoo Kandiar by United Engineers Limited
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a rectangular letter. There are two punch holes at the top of the paper.  ""On Admiralty List""
metadata.subject_terms_1: ""United Engineers Limited"" and ""Uniteers"" are displayed at the top of the letter. Just below the main heading letters of recommendation companies engineers
metadata.subject_terms_2: Contractors Engineers Letters it is stated that Singapore is the ""Head Office"" while ""Penang & Malacca"" and ""Ipoh"" are stated as the ""Branches"". At the end of the letter Emplyment references
metadata.subject_terms_3: Letters there is a signature as well as the designation ""M.I.E.E. Kandiar, Appavoo
metadata.subject_terms_4: M.Inst. R.E."". The letter is not addressed to anyone in particular
metadata.context_1: and ""To Whom It May Concern"" serves as the salutation."
